CHAT.comment: at the start of the recording June is not being cooperative. she and her mother are in the center of the floor and her mother is trying to persuade her to look at the little pigs book.

u.a: June is lying on the floor in a tantrum , she is crying
June is hiding her head under a chair , her mother tickles her .
mother lifts June out from under the chair and stands her up .
mother sits June on the chair but June slides back down on to the floor .
mother shows June a picture in the book , the picture shows a fruit stall at the market .
June looks at a cat in the picture .
points to a cookie in the pig's hand
June sees a loose page from the book that has fallen on the floor , she gets off the chair and picks it up .
June has walked over to the bookshelf .
mother looks puzzled and then points to the cat in the jigsaw which is on the floor .
June picks up a bowl and asks for some cheerios .
June has tipped up the bowl .
mother points to the book that she is holding , June turns her back on the book .
June doesn't look at the book or her mother .
climbs up on to a chair and spots a bottle
puts the bottle of juice in front of June
silence during which June drinks from the bottle .
holds out a book of pets for June to see
June stands up , takes the book and sits down with it
June sees the top of a book sticking out of the toybox , it is a mickey mouse book "The Sorcerer's Apprentice ." she tries to pull it out of the toybox .
lifts the book out of the toybox
no response , June is looking at the pets book , she stops and pulls the cinderella book out of the toybox .
June tries to put the mickey mouse book back into the toybox but fails , she cries .
June has a rubber duck in her hand .
June points to a picture of a cat in the pets book
June points to a puppy in the book
June points to another puppy in the book
June turns the page and points to a duck .
June turns the page and points to a picture of a puppy .
June turns the page and points to a duck .
June turns the page and points to another picture of a duck
<bef> points to a picture of a calf
points to a duck on the next page
June turns the page and points to a kitten
June stands and walks towards her mother with the book .
the kitten is playing with a ball of wool .
mother moves the book into the view of the camera .
<bef> points to a duck on the page
June has a full scale tantrum and screams .
June goes to the toybox and starts to look in it .
mother picks up a toy telephone .
no response , silence during which June is lifting things out of the toybox .
mother makes the phone ring and holds it to June's ear .
mother lifts the phone to June's ear again .
June takes the handset and puts it to her ear .
mother makes the phone ring again , June takes the whole thing away from her mother .
gets a soft toy cat from the toybox
mother puts the toy back into the toybox , June puts the phone into the toybox .
lifts a strand of June's hair
<aft> June lifts the toy cat out of the toybox . <bef> touches June's chin
lifts a cube out of the toybox and drops it on the floor
June lifts a second cube out of the toybox and hands it to her mother .
June lifts out another cube and gives it to her mother .
June puts all the cubes together .
June hands a cube to her mother , mother holds it out
mother is still holding up her hand .
June goes back to looking in the toybox , mother drops her hand
June hands her mother an old birthday card out of the toybox wriggles her fingers
June goes back to looking in her toybox .
June picks out a toy phone handset that rattles , she rattles it and hands it to her mother and continues to look in the toybox , June finds the ball in the toybox .
June hands the ball to her mother
June takes the ball back from her mother
June drops the ball into the toybox and then picks it out again and hands it back to her mother .
June takes the book from her mother and looks at it , then she puts the book down and looks in the toybox again .
mother unfolds the seashore book , June looks at it
June sees a separated piece of the book on the floor and picks it up .
June scans along the unfolded book , trying to match up the separated piece with the rest .
no response , mother doesn't turn the book over
June is looking at the separate page .
mother points to where the separated page fits
mother turns the separated page over
June has the page upside down
silence during which June folds the book up and then opens it out and continues to look at it .
no response , June is still intent upon the beach book , silence .
seashore book is still upside down , no response .
mother points to the man again <bef> points to a man in a deck chair
no response , June turns the book over and then turns it back to the same side again
silence , June returns to the seashore book
mother holds out a fire prevention leaflet .
mother shows June the picture on the paper .
silence , June drops the paper , mother puts the snow white book in front of June .
June looks at the book and then turns the page .
June turns the page , June goes back to the seashore book and waves her arms around as if she is brushing something away . mother removes the book and the toys on the floor .
points to one of the dwarves
June pulls here own shoe off and produces it from underneath the book .
silence during which mother looks at the book and June takes off her other shoe and holds it up for her mother to see .
June attempts to remove her sock .
June sticks her foot up in the air , the sock is still on
June is still trying to get the sock off .
June eventually succeeds in removing her sock
June stands and drinks from her bottle
mother shows June a picture in the cinderella book
points to a pumpkin in the picture
silence during which June takes another drink and then looks at her mother . mother begins to play with some stacking blocks .
silence during which mother builds a tower
silence during which mother builds another tower
June knocks the towers down , mother picks up a book of animal pictures .
June takes the animal book away from her mother , mother gets the Mickey Mouse book .
mother abandons the Mickey Mouse book and gets a different one . no response , silence .
mother puts down the book and begins to dig in the toybox , mother pulls out the toy bug .
June slips on something on the floor
mother picks up a soft toy
silence during which June and her mother play with the stacking blocks , they build a tower .
silence during which June plays with the stacking blocks .
mother places a block for June
mother wraps the rabbit in a blanket . silence
June continues to play with the stacking blocks .
June takes the rabbit in the blanket and rocks it .
June holds the rabbit out to her mother and then begins to rock it as her mother sings .
silence during which mother hands June a second soft toy , she holds the new toy and the rabbit in her arms and covers them with the blanket .
June walks across the room to the bookshelf and lays one of the toys on the floor .
June goes back to get the other toy , carries it over and lays it by the first one .
June covers the toys with the blanket
silence during which June covers the toys again and settles them down , tucks them in .
June picks up another toy rabbit and puts it with the other toys under the blanket .
June takes the book and puts it down
June walks to her mother and gives her a soft toy
June hands a rabbit to her mother
mother nurses the rabbit she was given and then talks about the one that is still on the floor underneath the blanket .
June picks up the second rabbit and hands it to her mother
June is turning circles looking at the floor
June finds a piece of chewed toffee on the floor . no response
mother disposes of the toffee , June picks up a bead necklace .
mother picks up the tom and jerry book
no response , silence during which June plays with the beads .
June turns back and looks at the book .
June is searching on the floor by her feet .
finds a sock and hands it to June
June grabs hold of her own foot .
June puts the sock on her foot
June is looking around for the other sock
mother looks for the other sock
picks up the shoe and unties the laces
June takes the shoe from her mother before the laces are open and tries to get it on her foot .
mother unties the shoe laces , June grabs hold of her toes .
silence during which mother unties the other shoe and June tries to put her foot in the wrong shoe . mother holds out a shoe .
June sticks her foot in the air , the shoe is balanced precariously on her toes .
mother puts the shoe on for June
meanwhile June has removed the sock from her other foot
June tries unsuccessfully to put her sock on
June puts the sock on and begins to remove the shoe and sock from her other foot .
mother pulls off the shoe which June had half on .
June finds a hair stuck to her foot , she picks it off .
June is intent on putting her sock back on
no response , the sock gets inadvertently pulled off .
June puts the sock back on
June has pulled her sock off .
June puts her hand in the sock and the shoe on her hand
no response as June is trying to put her sock on her foot again .
mother gets the bug out of the toybox .
no response , June puts the sock on and then begins to put her shoe on . mother pats June's back .
mother is playing with bug . June gives up with her shoe , takes off her sock and takes the string attached to the bug .
no response as June is still trying to get her shoe on .
June begins to pull the bug along
June drops the bug on the floor .
June looks very closely at her toes .
<aft> June pulls the train towards herself . <bef> mother gets the pull along toy train
June turns her back to her mother
